DOC.brief_summary: A cross-sectional , observational multicenter study assess reason choose 3-year hormonal IUD level IUDs knowledge among woman age 18 29 year . The study conduct standard clinical practice condition public private gynecology clinic single study visit . Approximately 1,000 woman age 18 29 year freely choose 3 year hormonal IUD contraceptive method include study .
